author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5436: Convert cache keys to String to allow other types as well. Thanks to Michal Svab for the patch.

author: uschindler
msg: Allow running nightly Jenkins Maven build from a single ANT target. This automatically downloads the Internet (sorry, the correct Maven version 2.2.1, of course) to do this - no need to install Maven at all: ant run-maven-build
